class.name: EditorImportPlugin
class.brief_description: Registers a custom resource importer in the editor. Use the class to parse any file and import it as a new resource type.

method.name: _get_import_options
method.description: Gets the options and default values for the preset at this index. Returns an Array of Dictionaries with the following keys: [code]name[/code], [code]default_value[/code], [code]property_hint[/code] (optional), [code]hint_string[/code] (optional), [code]usage[/code] (optional).

method.name: _get_import_order
method.description: Gets the order of this importer to be run when importing resources. Importers with [i]lower[/i] import orders will be called first, and higher values will be called later. Use this to ensure the importer runs after the dependencies are already imported. The default import order is [code]0[/code] unless overridden by a specific importer. See [enum ResourceImporter.ImportOrder] for some predefined values.

method.name: _get_importer_name
method.description: Gets the unique name of the importer.

method.name: _get_option_visibility
_get_preset_count
method.description: Gets the number of initial presets defined by the plugin. Use [method _get_import_options] to get the default options for the preset and [method _get_preset_name] to get the name of the preset.

method.name: _get_preset_name
method.description: Gets the name of the options preset at this index.

method.name: _get_priority
method.description: Gets the priority of this plugin for the recognized extension. Higher priority plugins will be preferred. The default priority is [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: _get_recognized_extensions
method.description: Gets the list of file extensions to associate with this loader (case-insensitive). e.g. [code]["obj"][/code].

method.name: _get_resource_type
method.description: Gets the Godot resource type associated with this loader. e.g. [code]"Mesh"[/code] or [code]"Animation"[/code].

method.name: _get_save_extension
method.description: Gets the extension used to save this resource in the [code].godot/imported[/code] directory (see [member ProjectSettings.application/config/use_hidden_project_data_directory]).

method.name: _get_visible_name
method.description: Gets the name to display in the import window. You should choose this name as a continuation to "Import as", e.g. "Import as Special Mesh".

method.name: _import
method.description: Imports [param source_file] into [param save_path] with the import [param options] specified. The [param platform_variants] and [param gen_files] arrays will be modified by this function. This method must be overridden to do the actual importing work. See this class' description for an example of overriding this method.

method.name: append_import_external_resource
method.description: This function can only be called during the [method _import] callback and it allows manually importing resources from it. This is useful when the imported file generates external resources that require importing (as example, images). Custom parameters for the ".import" file can be passed via the [param custom_options]. Additionally, in cases where multiple importers can handle a file, the [param custom_importer] ca be specified to force a specific one. This function performs a resource import and returns immediately with a success or error code. [param generator_parameters] defines optional extra metadata which will be stored as [code skip-lint]generator_parameters[/code] in the [code]remap[/code] section of the [code].import[/code] file, for example to store a md5 hash of the source data.
